languages.text: "Я... почти не помню. Голоса, мои старые добрые шепотки, вдруг стали красными... острыми... начали резать, терзать, рвать на кусочки, я закричала, позвала на помощь... и пришла она". {n}Идира со стоном хватается за голову.{/n} "Черт побери, почему голоса и сейчас так шумят?! Заткнитесь! Заткнитесь, ну!"

traits.locale_text: "Я совсем ничего не помню. Все, что болтается в памяти — это то, как голоса, мои старые добрые шепотки, вдруг стали красными и такими острыми! Они начали резать, терзать, рвать на маленькие кусочки, я закричала, позвала на помощь... и пришла она". {n}Идира со стоном хватается за голову.{/n} "Черт побери, почему эти проклятые голоса и сейчас так шумят?! Заткнитесь! Заткнитесь все!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "I... can barely remember. The voices, my old, good whispers, they suddenly turned red... sharp... They started cutting, tearing, ripping me to pieces. I cried out, I called for help... and she came." {n}Idira groans and clutches her head.{/n} "Damn it, why are the voices making so much noise now? Shut up! Shut UP!"
languages.original_text: "Я... почти не помню. Голоса, мои старые добрые шепотки, вдруг стали красными... острыми... начали резать, терзать, рвать на кусочки, я закричала, позвала на помощь... и пришла она". {n}Идира со стоном хватается за голову.{/n} "Черт побери, почему голоса и сейчас так шумят?! Заткнитесь! Заткнитесь, ну!"

traits.locale_text: "I... can barely remember. The voices, my old, good whispers, they suddenly turned red... sharp... They started cutting, tearing, ripping me to pieces. I cried out, I called for help... and she came." {n}Indira groans and clutches her head.{/n} "Damn it, why are the voices making so much noise now? Shut up! Shut UP!"

I cried out, I called for help... and she came." {n}Idira groans and clutches her head.{/n} "Damn it, why are the voices making so much noise now? Shut up! Shut UP!"

languages.text: “我……已经几乎记不清了。那些声音，那些善意的低语，突然就变成了红色……非常尖锐……它们撕扯着我，把我切成了碎片。我哭了起来。我大声呼救……于是她就来了。”{n}伊迪拉呻吟着，紧紧地捂住她的头。{/n}“该死，为什么那些声音变得这么响？闭嘴！闭嘴啊！”
languages.original_text: "I... can barely remember. The voices, my old, good whispers, they suddenly turned red... sharp... They started cutting, tearing, ripping me to pieces. I cried out, I called for help... and she came." {n}Idira groans and clutches her head.{/n} "Damn it, why are the voices making so much noise now? Shut up! Shut UP!"

traits.locale_text: “我……已经几乎记不清了。那些声音，那些善意的低语，突然就变成了红色……非常尖锐……它们撕扯着我，把我切成了碎片。我哭了起来。我大声呼救……于是她就来了。”{n}伊迪拉呻吟着，紧紧地捂住她的头。{/n}“该死，为什么那些声音变得这么响？闭嘴！闭嘴啊！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Apenas lo recuerdo... Las voces, mis viejos susurros, de repente se volvieron rojos... afilados... empezaron a cortar, a rajar, a despedazarme. Grité, pedí ayuda... y entonces fue cuando vino». {n}Idira gime y se lleva las manos a la cabeza.{/n} «Maldita sea, ¿por qué hacen tanto ruido las voces ahora? ¡Callaos! ¡SILENCIO!».
languages.original_text: "I... can barely remember. The voices, my old, good whispers, they suddenly turned red... sharp... They started cutting, tearing, ripping me to pieces. I cried out, I called for help... and she came." {n}Idira groans and clutches her head.{/n} "Damn it, why are the voices making so much noise now? Shut up! Shut UP!"

traits.locale_text: «Apenas lo recuerdo... Las voces, mis viejos susurros, de repente se volvieron rojos... afilados... empezaron a cortar, a rajar, a despedazarme. Grité, pedí ayuda... y entonces fue cuando vino». {n}Idira gime y se lleva las manos a la cabeza.{/n} «Maldita sea, ¿por qué hacen tanto ruido las voces ahora? ¡Callaos! ¡SILENCIO!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「…ほとんど覚えていないわ。声が、あたいの古い、心地よい囁きが、突然赤くなって…鋭くなって…それがあたいを切り刻み、引き裂き、バラバラにした。あたいは泣き叫び、助けを求めたわ…そして、彼女が来たの」{n}イディラはうめき声をあげ、頭をかかえる。{/n}「ああっ、なんでこんなに声がうるさいんの？うるさい！黙れ！黙って！」
languages.original_text: "I... can barely remember. The voices, my old, good whispers, they suddenly turned red... sharp... They started cutting, tearing, ripping me to pieces. I cried out, I called for help... and she came." {n}Idira groans and clutches her head.{/n} "Damn it, why are the voices making so much noise now? Shut up! Shut UP!"

traits.locale_text: 「…ほとんど覚えていないわ。声が、あたいの古い、心地よい囁きが、突然赤くなって…鋭くなって…それがあたいを切り刻み、引き裂き、バラバラにした。あたいは泣き叫び、助けを求めたわ…そして、彼女が来たの」{n}イディラはうめき声をあげ、頭をかかえる。{/n}「ああっ、なんでこんなに声がうるさいんの？うるさい！黙れ！黙って！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ich ... kann mich kaum erinnern. Die Stimmen, mein gutes altes Flüstern, sie wurden plötzlich rot ... scharf ... Sie fingen an, mich in Stücke zu reißen. Ich schrie, rief um Hilfe ... und sie kam." {n}Idira stöhnt und schlägt sich gegen den Kopf.{/n} "Verdammt, warum machen die Stimmen einen solchen Lärm? Schweigt! Seid STILL!"
languages.original_text: "I... can barely remember. The voices, my old, good whispers, they suddenly turned red... sharp... They started cutting, tearing, ripping me to pieces. I cried out, I called for help... and she came." {n}Idira groans and clutches her head.{/n} "Damn it, why are the voices making so much noise now? Shut up! Shut UP!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich ... kann mich kaum erinnern. Die Stimmen, mein gutes altes Flüstern, sie wurden plötzlich rot ... scharf ... Sie finden an, mich in Stücke zu reißen. Ich schrie, rief um Hilfe ... und sie kam." {n}Idira stöhnt und schlägt sich gegen den Kopf.{/n} "Verdammt, warum machen die Stimmen einen solchen Lärm? Schweigt! Seid STILL!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Je... Mes souvenirs sont confus. Les voix, ces bons vieux murmures... ils sont subitement devenus rouges... et tranchants comme des lames de rasoir... Ils se sont mis à me lacérer de toutes parts pour me tailler en pièces. J'ai hurlé, j'ai appelé à l'aide... et elle est venue. » {n}Idira gémit en se prenant la tête à deux mains.{/n} « Bon sang, pourquoi ces voix sont-elles aussi bruyantes ? Taisez-vous ! SILENCE, j'ai dit ! »
languages.original_text: "I... can barely remember. The voices, my old, good whispers, they suddenly turned red... sharp... They started cutting, tearing, ripping me to pieces. I cried out, I called for help... and she came." {n}Idira groans and clutches her head.{/n} "Damn it, why are the voices making so much noise now? Shut up! Shut UP!"

traits.locale_text: « Je... Mes souvenirs sont confus. Les voix, ces bons vieux murmures... ils sont subitement devenus rouges... et tranchants comme des lames de rasoir... Ils se sont mis à me lacérer de toutes parts pour me tailler en pièces. J'ai hurlé, j'ai appelé à l'aide... et elle est venue. » {n}Idira gémit en se prenant la tête à deux mains.{/n} « Bon sang, pourquoi ces voix sont-elles aussi bruyantes ? Taisez-vous ! SILENCE, j'ai dit ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Zar zor hatırlıyorum. Sesler, zihnimdeki o eski, güzel fısıltılar aniden kıpkırmızı oldu... Keskinleşti... Beni doğramaya, yırtmaya, parçalamaya başladılar. Yardım dilendim, ağladım... Sonra o geldi." {n}İdira inleyip başını kavrıyor.{/n} "Kahretsin, sesler neden bu kadar yüksek? Susun! SUSUN DEDİM!"
languages.original_text: "I... can barely remember. The voices, my old, good whispers, they suddenly turned red... sharp... They started cutting, tearing, ripping me to pieces. I cried out, I called for help... and she came." {n}Idira groans and clutches her head.{/n} "Damn it, why are the voices making so much noise now? Shut up! Shut UP!"

traits.locale_text: "Zar zor hatırlıyorum. Sesler, zihnimdeki o eski, güzel fısıltılar aniden kıpkırmızı oldu... Keskin oldu... Beni doğramaya, yırtmaya, parçalamaya başladılar. Yardım dilendim, ağladım... Sonra o geldi." {n}İdira inliyor ve başını kavrıyor.{/n} "Kahretsin, sesler neden bu kadar yüksek? Susun! SUSUN DEDİM!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
